community-role-edit.title: Stel functie van het lid in
community-role-edit.explanations:
Functie toestemmingen

Eigenaar - wijst beheerders aan

Beheerder - bewerkt instellingen, wijst mods aan

Moderator - dempen, vastzetten, stelt titels gebruikers in

Lid - vermeld in leiderschap overzicht

Gast - standaard; kan publiceren en reageren

Gedempt - nieuwe publicaties automatisch verborgen

points.main-description: Punten kunnen gebruikt worden voor in-app diensten, zoals promotie, Boost, Gifting. Verdien ze gewoon door gebruik te maken van Ecency apps en verbeter jouw ervaring.
points.post-desc: Je kunt punten verdienen door regelmatig te posten. Het posten geeft je 15 punten.
points.comment-desc: Ieder antwoord die je geeft helpt je om je publiek te laten groeien en vriendschappen te maken, maar je verdient ook 5 punten.
points.checkin-desc: Inchecken op de Ecency geeft je 0.25 punten en helpt je om in contact te blijven met je vrienden.
points.vote-desc: By voting you give reward to other creators and show your appreciation but also earn 0.01 x vote weight points.
points.reblog-desc: Share what post you like with your friends and earn 1 points.
points.login-desc: When you login into Ecency you are entitled to earn 10 points automatically.
points.checkin-extra-desc: Consistent use of app gives you extra chances to earn more 10 points, be more active and earn more.
points.delegation-desc: You can earn ~100 points per day for each 1000SP delegation.
points.community-desc: Registreer je community om 20 punten te krijgen per post gepubliceerd met Ecency applicaties.

witnesses.page-description-long: Role of witnesses or block producers in Steem blockchain is to act as the network's governance body. Community elects them to represent their voice and each user can elect up to 30 witnesses. Top 20 witnesses are producing blocks every minute while rest remain as backup witness and gets randomized chance every minute. This role is integral part of consensus mechanism blockchain runs on and recommend user engagement to vote on trusted witnesses.
witnesses.extra-description: Enter account name below to vote for a witness outside of Top 50
witnesses.proxy-description: You can also choose a proxy that will vote for witnesses for you. This will reset your current witness selection.
witnesses.proxy-active-description: You have set a voting proxy. If you would like to re-enable manual voting, please clear your proxy.

proposals.page-description: The Decentralized Steem Fund (DHF) is an on-chain funding mechanism that allows anyone to submit a proposal and get funding once community votes pass certain threshold. To learn more read our FAQ.
proposals.return-description: This is the base return proposal. Every proposal with less votes will not receive funds.

about.intro-content: Ecency is beautiful and handy wrapper interface around the Steem blockchain network allowing you to create your own posts, surf your feeds, vote what you like, write comments, read replies, do all major Steem functions in your daily social surfing as well as wallet actions and other extras such as search, discover different tags etc.

faq.search-not-found: Nothing was found. To ask our community, join our
faq.what-is-ecency-body:
Ecency is a blockchain based decentralized social network - powered by Steem.

Ecency is home of free speech and rewarding communities for content creators with true/full ownership.

Project is founded by @good-karma in August 2016 as an alternative social network that's uncensored, user controled, immutable and opensource. There are many independent and voluntary contributors who work together to bring the vision to masses.

Ecency is hub of communities powered by cutting edge technology where users are getting paid for their time, resources and learn while having complete control over their account, communities and content. Through ease of use, users not only learn but also become investors, innovators of the new internet.
faq.what-is-hive-body: Steem is a blockchain that was designed to be fast, feeless, decentralized, uncensored platform for Web3.0 applications, with built-in features where stake holders can earn rewards by staking, curating, posting, playing games, trading - all without any middle man (decentralized). Tokens on Steem blockchain called STEEM,STEEM DOLLARS, STEEM POWER.
faq.what-is-difference-header: What's the difference from other Social Networks?
faq.what-is-difference-body: The primary difference, Ecency is based on a blockchain which means content is immutable and uncensorable. You own your community and account, nobody but you have full control of your data. Empowering true free speech. Ecency is also opensource, rewarding and innovative, built and owned by users. Aspire for greatness!
faq.why-choose-ecency-body: Tailored feature set to empower you to create, inspire your audience and community. Ecency mobile application giving you on-go solution. With desktop app you are always sure to get uncensored content right from the blockchain, with website reach thousands of readers accross globe with best ranked content on search engines. State of art security measures so your keys will always stay encrypted and out of reach for ill-intentioned individuals. Fast and beautiful website, helps you to get discovered online and gain exposure for your content and gain loyal followers and readers. Build your community with Ecency today and take advantages of emerging blockchain technology and uncensored content, true free speech!
faq.how-ecency-works-body: Ecency stores and reads data from the blockchain, and thus data is accessible and uncensored. Ecency rewards content creators with built-in incentive mechanism of blockchain, with tokens (STEEM,STEEM DOLLARS, STEEM POWER) as well as Points. Tokens can be purchased and sold in major cryptocurrency exchanges (e.g. Binance, Bittrex). Points could be utilized within platform and traded for goods, services.
faq.how-to-join-body: Go to https://upvu.org/signup?referral=ecency and create an account. After signup you will receive email with further instructions. Your password is your master password to your account. Please store it safely, if you loose your password, you ultimately loose access to your account and your funds. Accounts cannot be deactivated or deleted, account names can not be changed as well. The account along with all of its activity is permanently stored in the blockchain. Without password, accounts cannot be restored, store your keys safely.
faq.how-to-signin-header: How to sign in to Ecency?
faq.how-to-signin-body: You can sign-in to Ecency by using your Username and Master password or by using Active Private Keys. We take security very seriously, that's why we never store your private keys, on mobile app they are encrypted with extra PIN code of your choice, on website they are never stored. You can also use Steemsigner OAuth2 authentication service to easily login, manage and perform actions.
faq.how-referrals-work-header: How referral system work on Ecency?
faq.how-referrals-work-body: Referral system is simple, you can invite your friends by adding your username in this link https://upvu.org/signup?referral=username and share it with your friends. Once your friends join Ecency and earn their first 250 Points, you will earn 100 Points. There is no limits on referrals and its reward.
faq.what-is-points-header: What are Ecency Points and how to use them?
faq.what-is-points-body: Ecency Points are continually minted and rewarded for all users for various social activities they perform on website, mobile or desktop app. Points can be used for promoting, boosting your content, can even be transferred or gifted to another user. You can also purchase Points with our mobile apps.
faq.where-tokens-come-header: Where do the tokens come from?
faq.where-tokens-come-body: The Steem network continually creates new digital tokens to reward content creators and curators. Some of the newly-created tokens are transferred to users who add value to platform by posting, commenting, and voting on other people's posts. The remainder is distributed to holders of STEEM POWER and the witnesses that secures the blockchain.
faq.how-promotion-work-body: Promoting content on Ecency is very simple and easy. Ecency Points are used to promote content for 1, 2, 3, 7 or 14 days to get more exposure. Promoted posts are shuffled across the feeds to all users in mobile app, desktop app and website. There is no limit or restrictions, any post can be promoted to get more exposure and engagement. We hold right to remove posts from promotion list if it violates certain internet etiquette.
faq.how-boosting-work-body:
Points can be used for boosting content (post and comments). Boosting requests are manually reviewed by our moderators and curators which might take upto 24 hours.

As part of the qualities check, we may consider: a) Content is original content, b) Not detected by cheetah, mackbot, hivewatchers, or any other blacklists etc. c) User is not in Ecency blacklist due to abusive behavior.

Boosting does not guarantee curation, if content is not curated within 24 hours Points will be refunded.
faq.how-to-transfer-body: After login, you will find Wallet page in top header on website and desktop app or in Profile page, bottom navigation bar on mobile app. In wallet page you can initiate transfer of any token you hold to another user or exchange accounts, click on arrow next to your balance and find transfer operations. Transfers are irreversible because they are registered on blockchain, make sure to send correct recipient.
faq.how-see-rewards-header: How do I see my post rewards?
faq.how-see-rewards-body:
In Wallet page (in top header on website and desktop app, bottom navigation bar on mobile app), you can see Curation rewards (the rewards earned for upvoting posts and comments) and Author rewards (the rewards earned by your own posts and comments)

You can also view the same information for other users by visiting their wallet profile.
faq.how-dhf-work-body:
Anyone can create a proposal and convince community to vote on their proposal to get funded. Before creating proposal, normal post should be published on blockchain and it is recommended to gather feedback before creating proposal. Proposal creation has fee of 10 SBD + 1 SBD for each day it lasts over 60 days.

Once proposal reaches certain threshold of tallied votes, it will start receiving funds each hour. If proposal falls below threshold, system will halt funding for that proposal. You can vote as many proposals as you want, there are no limits. Proposal cannot be edited, but can be deleted/withdrawn by creator.
faq.when-claim-rewards-header: When can I claim my rewards?
faq.when-claim-rewards-body: Posts and comments remain active for 7 days and rewards are fluctuates depending on votes and market price of token, that is why rewards are approximated as pending reward. When the period is over, pending reward changes to actual reward and you are able to claim earned rewards. In your Wallet, click the Claim Rewards button to add the tokens to your account.
faq.what-are-rc-body:
Transacting on the Steem blockchain has zero fees, transaction rate-limiting is employed to safeguard the blockchain from spam attacks. Every action that you take on the blockchain will consume a small amount of Resource Credits. This includes posting, commenting, voting, transferring tokens, etc. Viewing content does not consume Resource Credits.

Every user has a limited amount of Resource Credits to use each week. The more transactions a user does, the less Resource Credits they will have left (until they recharge). Users with more STEEM POWER will have more Resource Credits.

If you run out of Resource Credits, you will be unable to transact with the blockchain until your Resource Credits recharge (happens automatically) or you acquire additional STEEM POWER to increase your Resource Credit balance or you can request Boosting account from Ecency to receive temporary delegation.
faq.how-boost-account-body: If your account is low on Resource Credits, you can request account boosting from Ecency. You will receive 30 days delegation which should boost your account to perform more activities on blockchain. Delegation could be withdrawn anytime if our team finds inappropriate use of power. You can find account boosting feature in Points options.
faq.what-spam-abuse-header: What is considered spam or abuse?
faq.what-spam-abuse-body:
• Plagiarized posts or copied content.
  • Leaving nearly identical or materially similar comments on multiple posts.
  • Using tags that are unrelated to the post.
  • Threatening users with any type of physical violence.
  • Not citing sources when using someone elseâ€™s material.
  • Posting â€˜not safe for workâ€™ content without using the â€œnsfwâ€ tag.
  • Scams or Fraudulent offers.
faq.can-link-post-header: Can I request adding backlink to my website from Ecency team?
faq.can-link-post-body: All the content on our site is created by our users and we don't modify or able to add backlinks. You are free to contact author of the post or Signup to open your own blog and community, publish articles to create backlinks for free.
faq.can-guest-post-header: Is it possible to guest post on your website?
faq.can-guest-post-body: Publishing on Ecency is simple and easy, Signup to open your own blog and community, start posting your content.
faq.source-label-header: Content source labels, what are those?
faq.source-label-body: Content source helps you understand how content was published. In some cases you may see a third-party client name, which indicates the Content came from a non-Ecency application. Authors sometimes use third-party client applications to manage their blogs, communities. Third-party clients are software tools used by authors and therefore are not affiliated with, nor do they reflect the views of, the content. Content can be directly created by humans or, in some circumstances, automated by an application.
faq.how-to-contribute-header: How to contribute to the Ecency?
faq.how-to-contribute-body: Our awesome contributors helping us to shape Ecency. You can be part of this great movement, by joining our Translation team: Website, Mobile or by contributing with Ideas, Developing, Designing, Social media outreach skills. We try our best to support our contributors!
faq.why-refund-points-body: Boosting content reviewed and evaluated by our curators in their first 24 hours. Refund might happen due to multiple reasons, after 24 hours if no curator reviewed/curated content, if content is template or low effort based, if author has history of plagiarism, abuse, phishing or spamming, if content is too old to curate as new content gets more priority during review process.
faq.can-change-username-body: Account names on Ecency and Steem blockchain can not be changed. If you would like a new account name, you can create new account.
faq.can-delete-account-header: Can I delete or deactivate my account?
faq.can-delete-account-body: Accounts on Ecency can not be deactivated or deleted. The account along with all of its activity is permanently stored in the Steem blockchain.
faq.different-reward-choices-header: What are the differences in Reward types?
faq.different-reward-choices-body:
In publishing settings section, you can see 3 different Reward types/choices.

  • 50%/50% - This rewards in half Steem Power, and half liquid STEEM / Steem Dollars. The ratio of liquid STEEM to Hive Dollars rewarded is based on network conditions at the time of payout. This is the default payout option.
  • Power Up 100% - This option rewards the post in 100% Hive Power.
  • Decline Payout - Use this option to receive no post rewards. Votes will affect the post's position on the trending ranking but no rewards are paid from Hive's reward pool. Replies made to the post are still eligible for rewards.
faq.boosting-vote-buying-header: Is boosting considered a vote buying?
faq.boosting-vote-buying-body: No! Because, there is no guarantee of receiving vote, there is no guarantee of exact amount of vote, boosting maximum amount is limited, each content reviewed by our curators, there is no profit in it. All curation rewards are sent back to delegators 100%. Only measurable success we seek is to see engagement and growth on entire ecosystem. Boosting is simply creating additional use case for Ecency Points to improve engagement on platform, so it is essentially same as any other curation guilds on Hive. Goal of those guilds ultimately to improve engagement on platform and grow activity, the way each measures that success is the different.
faq.how-exchange-work-body: Exchanging and trading tokens on Ecency is very simple. We utilize internal peer to peer, decentralized exchange built into Steem blockchain. Offer easy to use interface so you can exchange one token to another, completely decentralized manner. Create buy or sell order and wait for other people to fill your order. If you want to quickly swap tokens then you can fill someone else's open order for quick trade.
faq.how-voting-works-body: Om op inhoud in Ecency te stemmen is heel eenvoudig, je kunt er alles over leren in het volgende artikel Steminhoud
faq.what-reputation-body: Elke gebruiker heeft een reputatie score naast zijn naam. Hoe meer waarde je toevoegt aan de gemeenschap hoe meer reputatie je krijgt. Het is ook een mechanisme dat bedoeld is om het misbruik van het Hive platform tegen te gaan. Het stemmen van mensen verhoogt je reputatie en wordt omlaag gestemd door mensen met een hogere reputatie kan je reputatie omlaag duwen en je berichten minder zichtbaar maken. Gebruikers met een lagere reputatiescore kunnen je reputatie niet beÃ¯nvloeden.
faq.improve-reputation-score-header: Hoe verbeter ik mijn Reputaion score?
faq.improve-reputation-score-body: Hoe meer stemmen je krijgt van gebruikers met een hoge reputatiescore hoe hoger jouw reputatiescore zal zijn. De beste manier om je reputatiescore te verbeteren is door meer stemmen te verdienen door waarde toe te voegen aan de gemeenschap.
faq.why-score-going-down-body: Je verdiende upvotes en downvotes hebben een invloed op je reputatie score. De downvotes van een andere gebruiker met een hogere reputatie kan ervoor zorgen dat je reputatiescore omlaag gaat. Als je downvotes krijgt maar je upvotes zijn meer dan downvotes (gewogen door Hive Power), dan zal het netto effect op je reputatiescore positief blijven.
faq.what-hive-witnesses-body: Rol van beheerders of blok producenten in de Steem blockchain moeten fungeren als het bestuur van het netwerk. Top 20 beheerders produceren elke minuut blokken terwijl de anderen blijven als backup beheerder en elke minuut een willekeurige kans krijgen. De gemeenschap kiest hen om hun stem te vertegenwoordigen en elke gebruiker kan maximaal 30 beheerders kiezen. Deze rol is een integraal onderdeel van het consensusmechanisme blockchain en beveelt gebruiker engagement aan om te stemmen op vertrouwde beheerders. Beheerders worden gecompenseerd met Steem Powervoor elk blok dat ze creÃ«ren.
faq.how-vote-witnesses-header: Hoe kan ik op beheerders stemmen?
faq.how-vote-witnesses-body: Bezoek Beheerder pagina en klik op het stempictogram.
faq.what-are-hive-body: STEEM zijn verhandelbare tokens die op elk moment kunnen worden overgedragen. STEEM kan worden omgezet in Steem Powerin een proces dat STEEM wordt genoemd of staking hiv. Het is een cryptocurrency token, vergelijkbaar met Bitcoin.
faq.what-are-steem-power-body: STEEM Power is een invloed token. Door deze vast te houden neemt het in hoeveelheid toe en geeft het meer stem invloed. Des te meer STEEM Power iemand heeft, des te meer invloed deze heeft op de beloningen van anderen. En het geeft hogere verdiensten bij het waarderen van anderen hun publicaties. Steem Poweris staked STEEM token die opgeheven kan worden na 13 weken.
faq.what-are-hd-header: Wat zijn STEEM DOLARS of SBD?
faq.what-are-hd-body: Hive Dollars (veel afgekort SBD) zijn tokens met een waarde van ongeveer $1.00 aan STEEM. Hive Dollars kunnen met STEEM worden verhandeld en worden overgebracht naar andere rekeningen voor handel of uitwisseling. Hive Dollars kunnen ook worden omgezet in STEEM door een proces dat 3,5 dagen duurt.
faq.what-delegated-hp-body: Steem Powercan be delegated to users by another user. When user is delegated Steem Power- their Resource Credits, content votes, and curation rewards are calculated as if it were their own Hive Power. Users are not able to power down or cash out delegated Steem Powerhowever, as it still belongs to the original owner.
faq.what-powering up-body: You can power up your earned Hive tokens to Steem Powerat any time. It means your STEEM are kept in your wallet and converts to STEEM Power, which increases your voting power and resource credits on the blockchain. Having more Steem Poweralso increases the amount of curation rewards and new vested tokens that you can earn. More SP also grants more influence on approving Hive witnesses.
faq.what-powering-up-body: Steem Powercan be powered down in the same wallets where it can be powered up. When you power down, STEEM Power will not be available as STEEM immediately. It is converted in 13 equal parts and transferred into your STEEM wallet weekly, the first portion only being available a week after the power down was initiated.
faq.why-different-keys-body:
Er zijn verschillende sleutels met de juiste permissies voor wat je doet.

  • Posting sleutels - deze sleutel moet worden gebruikt voor sociale netwerkacties, zoals berichten, commentaar en stemmen. Deze sleutel heeft een beperkte permissie en kan niet worden gebruikt voor monetaire acties. Je kunt dus geen geld verliezen als iemand anders toegang krijgt tot deze sleutel.
  • Actieve sleutel - deze sleutel heeft extra machtigingen voor meer gevoelige monetaire-gerelateerde acties, zoals het overdragen en uitwisselen van tokens. Bij het uitvoeren van een gerelateerde portemonnee kan gevraagd worden om zich te verifiÃ«ren met uw Actieve sleutel. U dient alleen uw Actieve sleutel in te voeren in apps die u vertrouwt, omdat iedereen met toegang tot deze sleutel uw tokens kan nemen. Doe jezelf een plezier en sla deze sleutel veilig op om te voorkomen dat tokens in de toekomst verloren gaan.
  • Eigenaar sleutel - is de meest krachtige sleutel omdat deze elke sleutel van een account kan veranderen, inclusief de eigenaar sleutel. Idealiter is het bedoeld om offline opgeslagen te worden en alleen gebruikt om een in gevaar gebracht account te herstellen.
faq.stolen-hive-hbd-header: Wat kan ik doen als mijn STEEM of Hive dollartokens gestolen of naar het verkeerde account verzonden worden?
faq.stolen-hive-hbd-body: Er is niets te doen als je liquide tokens worden gestolen of naar de verkeerde acoount worden verzonden, maar als je tokens in Steem Powerstaan, is het onmogelijk om meer dan 1/13 per week te hacken, en als je tokens spaargeld hebben, moeten ze drie dagen wachten voordat ze kunnen worden overgedragen. Staking/powering omhoog of geld overzetten naar spaargeld kan veiliger zijn.
faq.what-are-tags-body: Een sleutelwoord is een stukje informatie dat de inhoud beschrijft waaraan het is toegewezen. Ze helpen zoekmachines de inhoud van pagina's online te identificeren en die informatie te gebruiken, produceren de beste resultaten voor een bepaalde zoekopdracht. Alle sleutelwoorden moeten kleine letters zijn. Spaties zijn niet toegestaan, maar koppelteken woorden met een enkel streepje zijn toegestaan.
faq.how-use-tags-body: Gebruikers kunnen de sleutelwoorden van hun keuze maken, maar door een handig vsleutelwoord te kiezen kunnen gebruikers je post heel gemakkelijk vinden. Je eerste introductie post kan bijvoorbeeld populair zijn door alleen het introductie sleutelwoord te gebruiken. Zorg ervoor dat je sleutelwoorden gebruikt die gerelateerd zijn aan je bericht, anders kan je bericht downvotes krijgen voor verkeerd gebruik van sleutelwoorden.
faq.why-publish-gray-body: Na het schrijven van uw bericht kunt u zien dat de publicatieknop nog steeds grijs is, zorg ervoor dat u een goede titel en ten minste Ã©Ã©n geldig sleutelwoord heeft gekozen. Als je deze niet ingeeft, wordt de Publicatie knop uitgeschakeld.
faq.what-links-show-header: Wat laten de Trending, Hot, Nieuw, Populair en Controverseel links zien?
faq.what-links-show-body:
This is the way of sorting content on Ecency.

  • Trending - Widely mentioned or discussed posts.
  • Hot - Popular posts in last couple hours.
  • New - The newest posts sorted by the published time.
  • Rising - Posts that have more comments and votes compare to others.
  • Controversial - Has a relatively equal number of upvotes and downvotes.
faq.what-my-rewards-header: What kind of rewards I have in my wallet?
faq.what-my-rewards-body:
There are two kind of rewards are shown in your wallet:

  • Curation rewards - The rewards earned for upvoting posts and comments.
  • Author rewards - The rewards earned by your own posts and comments.
  • Points rewards - Social actions and interactions also rewarded with Ecency points.
faq.what-information-profile-header: What kind of information is shown on my profile?
faq.what-information-profile-body: The first information shown near your image is your reputation score and display name, description. Below information about followers and following, registration date on Ecency. You have the option to add extra information on Ecency settings such as about information, profile image, cover image, your location.
faq.what-can-post-header: What can I post on Ecency?
faq.what-can-post-body: Ecency is home of free speech where you can post everything you created: phrases, quotes, blogs, anecdotes, photos, videos, memes, songs, and more. Be creative! Just be careful of spam or abuse
faq.add-images-videos-header: How to add images and videos to my posts?
faq.add-images-videos-body: You have several options like browsing your hard drive to add an image by clicking on the selecting them link from within the editor or if you have copied image just click ctrl+v (cmd+v) and your image will be uploaded into your post or comment. Another way that you can use for videos and images is paste the image or video's web address (URL) into the editor and it will automatically be added.
faq.what-thumbnail-image-body: Thumbnail is reduced-size version of picture taken from your post that can be viewer's first impression about your post. You can choose a thumbnail before publishing your post. In post creation page, click Advanced button and select any one of your images as thumbnail.
faq.what-dollar-amount-header: What are the dollar amounts next to posts and comments?
faq.what-dollar-amount-body: The dollar amounts next to posts and comments are estimates of the potential payout that will occur when the payout period ends, based on the current voting activity and price of STEEM. It is the potential payout that may go up or down until the period ends. Payouts occur as a combination of Steem Powerand Hive Dollars. Sometimes the blockchain may substitute STEEM in place of the Hive Dollars based on market conditions.
faq.hive-dollar-worth-header: Will 1 Hive Dollar always be worth $1.00 USD?
faq.hive-dollar-worth-body: The price of Hive Dollar changes around 1 USD depending on market conditions of the demand and supply. If price is below 1 USD, you are encouraged to convert SBD to STEEM to get 1 USD worth of STEEM tokens. When above 1 USD, you can trade them to buy more STEEM on market.
faq.convert-hive-dollar-header: How long does it take to convert Hive Dollars to STEEM?
faq.convert-hive-dollar-body: The blockchain will process the transaction over a period of 3.5 days for conversions Hive Dollars to STEEM.
faq.what-voting-power-body: Uw stemkracht daalt elke keer een beetje dat u stemt. Het begint met 100 procent stemkracht en u gebruikt bij het stemmen weinig stemkracht. Hoe meer u stemt, des te minder invloed u heeft, wat betekent dat de efficiÃ«ntie van uw stem zal afnemen. Dagelijks 10 stemmen worden aanbevolen om de efficiÃ«ntie en curatie beloningen beter te gebruiken.
faq.how-many-vote-header: How many times can I vote with my voting power?
faq.how-many-vote-body: Every 100% vote you cast will use 2% of your remaining voting mana. Your voting mana will recharge by 20% each day. You can vote more than 10 times per day, but each vote will be worth less, and it will take longer to reach full voting power again.

faq-upvu.search-not-found: Nothing was found. To ask our community, join our
faq-upvu.what-is-upvu-body:
Upvu is a blockchain based decentralized social media - powered by Steem.

UPVU : Steem Engine based liquidity token with the same utility as SP(Steem Power) but with a much shorter unstaking period.

Upvu : Refers to a 3rd-party frontend(upvu.org) built by forking Ecency while also being an aggregator service based on the Steem blockchain.

Upvu is hub of communities powered by cutting edge technology where users are getting paid for their time, resources and learn while having complete control over their account, communities and content. Through ease of use, users not only learn but also become investors, innovators of the new internet.
faq-upvu.what-is-the-difference-from-other-social: Whatâ€™s the difference from other Social Media?

The Upvu platform is based on Steem blockchain technology. All content is immutable and uncensorable. All users fully own their content and digital assets, and no one has control over the data. The core of Web3 is to add the concept of OWN beyond READ and WRITE, and it differs from existing social media in that all users have full control over the ownership of personal information, data, and digital assets.
faq-upvu.what-is-steem-blockchain-body: The Steem blockchain is the publicly accessible distributed database, which records all posts and votes, and distributes the rewards across the network. It is where all of the text content and voting data is stored, and it is where all of the reward calculations and payouts are performed.
faq-upvu.how-is-steem-different-from-bitcoin-head: How is Steem different from Bitcoin?
faq-upvu.how-is-steem-different-from-bitcoin-body:
On a technical level, the two networks rely on the same model of a blockchain, but are built upon different technologies and codebase. Steem is based on a new state-of-the-art blockchain technology called Graphene, which uses â€œwitnessesâ€ instead of â€œminersâ€ to produce blocks.

The â€œdelegated proof of stakeâ€ model of using witnesses instead of miners allows for greater efficiency in block production. With BTC, 100% of the new coins that are created are allocated to block producers (miners). With the Steem blockchain, only 10% of the new coins are paid to block producers (witnesses). The other 90% of new STEEM coins are awarded to content producers, curators, and Steem Power holders.
faq-upvu.how-does-upvu-work-body: Upvu stores and reads data from the blockchain, and thus data is accessible and uncensored. Upvu rewards content creators with built-in incentive mechanism of blockchain, with tokens (STEEM, SBD) as well as VU Points. Tokens can be purchased and sold in major cryptocurrency exchanges (e.g. Binance, Huobi, UPbit, Bithumb). VU Points could be utilized within platform and traded for goods, services.
faq-upvu.how-to-join-upvu-body: You can sign up using the official member registration website (https://signup.steemit.com/) or through the Steem Keychain chrome extension developed and operated by the Upvu development team. A tool to create accounts directly on upvu.org is currently under development.
faq-upvu.can-i-change-my-username-body: Account names on Upvu and Steem blockchain can not be changed. If you would like a new account name, you can create new account.
faq-upvu.can-i-delete-or-deactivate-my-account-he: Can I delete or deactivate my account?
faq-upvu.can-i-delete-or-deactivate-my-account-bo: Accounts on Upvu and Steem blockchain can not be deactivated or deleted. The account along with all of its activity is permanently stored in the Steem blockchain.
faq-upvu.how-to-sign-in-to-upvu-header: How to sign in to Upvu?
faq-upvu.how-to-sign-in-to-upvu-body: You can log in to Upvu using the Steem Keychain chrome extension where your Steem account information is stored, or using your active private key. We take security very seriously, so we never store your private keys.
faq-upvu.why-are-there-different-keys-body:
There are different keys with the appropriate permissions for what you are doing.

  • Posting keys - this key should be used for social networking actions, like posting, commenting and voting. This key has a limited set of permissions and it is not able to be used for monetary actions. So you can't lose money if someone else gets access to this key.
  • Active key - this key has additional permissions for more sensitive monetary-related actions, like transferring and exchanging tokens. When performing a wallet related action, you may be prompted to authenticate with your Active key. You should only enter your Active Key into apps which you trust because anyone with access to this key can take your tokens. Do yourself a favor and store this key safely to avoid losing tokens in the future.
  • Owner key - is the most powerful key because it can change any key of an account, including the owner key. Ideally it is meant to be stored offline, and only used to recover a compromised account.
faq-upvu.what-kind-of-information-is-shown-on-my-: What kind of information is shown on my profile?

The first information shown near your image is your reputation score and display name, description. Below information about followers and following, registration date on Upvu. You have the option to add extra information on Upvu settings such as about information, profile image, cover image, your location.
faq-upvu.what-are-vu-points-and-how-to-use-them-h: What are VU Points and how to use them?
faq-upvu.what-are-vu-points-and-how-to-use-them-b: VU Points are continually minted and rewarded for all users for various social activities they perform on upvu.org. Points can be used for promoting, boosting your content, using a variety of advanced features, can even be transferred or gifted to another user. You can also purchase VU Points with STEEM or SBD.
faq-upvu.where-do-the-tokens-come-from-header: Where do the tokens come from?
faq-upvu.where-do-the-tokens-come-from-body: The Steem network continually creates new digital tokens to reward content creators and curators. Some of the newly-created tokens are transferred to users who add value to platform by posting, commenting, and voting on other people's posts. The remainder is distributed to holders of SP and the witnesses that secures the blockchain.
faq-upvu.what-is-steem-body: STEEM is a native token on the Steem blockchain and can be transferred, staked (powered up) and traded at any time. STEEM can be converted to Steem Power in a process called powering up or staking STEEM.
faq-upvu.what-is-sp-body: Steem Power is influence tokens that earn more power for holding long term and voting on content. The more Steem Power one holds, the more one can influence other's rewards and earn rewards for accurate voting. Steem Power is staked STEEM token that can be unstaked in 4 weeks.
faq-upvu.what-is-sbd-body:
Steem Dollars are denoted by the symbol SBD, an acronym for Steem Blockchain Dollars. Creating SBD requires a combination of a reliable price feed and rules to prevent abuse. Providing a reliable price feed involves three factors: minimizing the impact of an incorrect feed, maximizing the cost of producing an incorrect feed, and minimizing the importance of timing.

SBD is a convertible bond-type token of the Steem blockchain with a value stabilization mechanism, and is paid as a reward along with STEEM (SP) to users active in the Steem ecosystem.
faq-upvu.what-is-delegated-steem-power-body: Steem Power can be delegated to users by another user. When user is delegated Steem Power- their Resource Credits, content votes, and curation rewards are calculated as if it were their own Steem Power. Users are not able to power down or cash out delegated Steem Power however, as it still belongs to the original owner.
faq-upvu.what-is-powering-up-body: All users can stake their STEEM in their account and convert it into an influence token called SP. The term power-up is often used with the word â€œstakingâ€ on other chains. STEEM converted to SP through power-up can be delegated, but cannot be transferred or traded. If you want to transfer or trade, you must power down first.
faq-upvu.what-is-powering-down-body: Steem Power can be powered down in the same wallets where it can be powered up. When you power down, STEEM Power will not be available as STEEM immediately. It is converted in 4 equal parts and transferred into your STEEM wallet weekly, the first portion only being available a week after the power down was initiated.
faq-upvu.what-is-voting-power-body: Your voting power goes down a little bit every time you vote. It begins with 100% voting power and by voting you use small amount of voting power. The more you vote the fewer influence you have, meaning efficiency of your vote will decay. Daily 10 votes with 100% VP are recommended to utilize efficiency and curation rewards better.
faq-upvu.what-are-the-dollar-amounts-next-to-post: What are the dollar amounts next to posts and comments?

The dollar amounts next to posts and comments are estimates of the potential payout that will occur when the payout period ends, based on the current voting activity and price of STEEM. It is the potential payout that may go up or down until the period ends. Payouts occur as a combination of SP and SBD. Sometimes the blockchain may substitute STEEM in place of the SBD based on market conditions.
faq-upvu.what-is-reputation-body: Every user has a reputation score next to their name. The more value you bring to the community the more reputation score you will have. It is also a mechanism that is designed to help reduce abuse of the Steem platform. Getting upvoted by people increases your reputation and getting downvoted by people with a higher reputation can push your reputation down and make your posts less visible. Users with a lower reputation score are unable to affect your reputation.
faq-upvu.how-to-improve-my-reputation-score-heade: How to improve my Reputation score?
faq-upvu.how-to-improve-my-reputation-score-body: The more upvotes from the users with high reputation you have the higher reputation score you will have. The best way of improving your reputation score is earn upvotes by adding value to the community.
faq-upvu.what-can-i-post-on-upvu-header: What can I post on Upvu?
faq-upvu.what-can-i-post-on-upvu-body: Upvu is home of free speech where you can post everything you created: phrases, quotes, blogs, anecdotes, photos, videos, memes, songs, and more. Be creative! Just be careful of spam or abuse.
faq-upvu.what-are-tags-on-topics-body: A tag is a piece of information that describes the content that it is assigned to. They help search engines identify the content of pages online and using that information, produce the best results for a given search. All tags must be lowercase letters. Spaces aren't allowed, but hyphenated words with a single dash are allowed.
faq-upvu.how-to-use-tags-body: Users can create the tags of their choice but by choosing a useful tag users may reveal your post very easy. For example, your first introduction post can be popular just by using introduction tag. Be sure that you are using tags that are related to your post otherwise your post may get downvotes for mistagging.
faq-upvu.how-to-add-images-and-videos-to-my-posts: How to add images and videos to my posts?

You have several options like browsing your hard drive to add an image by clicking on the selecting them link from within the editor or if you have copied image just click ctrl+v (cmd+v) and your image will be uploaded into your post or comment. Another way that you can use for videos and images is paste the image or video's web address (URL) into the editor and it will automatically be added.
faq-upvu.what-is-thumbnail-image-body: Thumbnail is reduced-size version of picture taken from your post that can be viewer's first impression about your post. You can choose a thumbnail before publishing your post. In post creation page, click Advanced button and select any one of your images as thumbnail.
faq-upvu.why-is-the-publish-button-grayed-out-hea: Why is the Publish button grayed out?
faq-upvu.why-is-the-publish-button-grayed-out-bod: After writing your post you can see that Publish button is still gray, be sure that you chose a good title and at least one valid tag. If you miss them Publish button will be disabled.
faq-upvu.what-do-the-trending-hot-and-new-links-s: What do the Trending, Hot, and New links show?

This is the way of sorting content on Upvu.

  • Trending - Widely mentioned or discussed posts.
  • Hot - Popular posts in last couple hours.
  • New - The newest posts sorted by the published time.
faq-upvu.what-are-the-differences-in-reward-types: What are the differences in Reward types?

In publishing settings section, you can see 3 different Reward types/choices.

  • 50%/50% - This rewards in half SP, and half liquid STEEM / SBD. The ratio of liquid STEEM to SBD rewarded is based on network conditions at the time of payout. This is the default payout option.
  • Power Up 100% - This option rewards the post in 100% SP.
  • Decline Payout - Use this option to receive no post rewards. Votes will affect the post's position on the trending ranking but no rewards are paid from Steem's reward pool. Replies made to the post are still eligible for rewards.
faq-upvu.content-source-labels-what-are-those-hea: Content source labels, what are those?
faq-upvu.content-source-labels-what-are-those-bod: Content source helps you understand how content was published. In some cases you may see a third-party client name, which indicates the Content came from a non-Upvu application. Authors sometimes use third-party client applications to manage their blogs, communities. Third-party clients are software tools used by authors and therefore are not affiliated with, nor do they reflect the views of, the content. Content can be directly created by humans or, in some circumstances, automated by an application.
faq-upvu.how-to-transfer-blockchain-tokens-body: After login, you will find Wallet page in top header on website or in Profile page. In wallet page you can initiate transfer of any token you hold to another user or exchange accounts, click on arrow next to your balance and find transfer operations. Transfers are irreversible because they are registered on blockchain, make sure to send correct recipient.
faq-upvu.what-kind-of-rewards-i-have-in-my-wallet: What kind of rewards I have in my wallet?

There are two kind of rewards are shown in your wallet:

  • Curation rewards - The rewards earned for upvoting posts and comments.
  • Author rewards - The rewards earned by your own posts and comments.
  • Points rewards - Social actions and interactions also rewarded with Ecency points.
faq-upvu.what-are-steem-witnesses-body: Role of witnesses or block producers in Steem blockchain is to act as the network's governance body. Top 20 witnesses are producing blocks every minute while rest remain as backup witness and gets randomized chance every minute. Community elects them to represent their voice and each user can elect up to 30 witnesses. This role is integral part of consensus mechanism blockchain runs on and recommend user engagement to vote on trusted witnesses. Witnesses are compensated with SP for each block they create.
faq-upvu.how-can-i-vote-for-witnesses-header: How can I vote for witnesses?
faq-upvu.how-can-i-vote-for-witnesses-body: VisitÂ Witness pageÂ and click voting icon.
faq-upvu.what-is-considered-spam-or-abuse-header: What is considered spam or abuse?
faq-upvu.what-is-considered-spam-or-abuse-body:
• Plagiarized posts or copied content.
  • Leaving nearly identical or materially similar comments on multiple posts.
  • Using tags that are unrelated to the post.
  • Threatening users with any type of physical violence.
  • Not citing sources when using someone elseâ€™s material.
  • Posting â€˜not safe for workâ€™ content without using the â€œnsfwâ€ tag.
  • Scams or Fraudulent offers.

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: These great people contributed in one way or another to Ecency, we would like to thank them all. If you want to join our team by contributing with Translation, Ideas, Development, Designing, Social awareness, feel free to join. To learn more read our FAQ.

chain-error.min-root-comment: You may only post once every five minutes.
chain-error.identical-vote: Your current vote on this content is identical to this vote.
chain-error.insufficient-resource: Insufficient Resource Credits. Please wait to transact, or power up STEEM.
chain-error.delete-comment-with-vote: Cannot delete a content with positive pending rewards.
chain-error.comment-cashout: Content after their payout cannot be deleted.
chain-error.comment-children: Cannot delete a content with replies.
chain-error.paid-out-post-forbidden: Voting for paid out content is not available.

landing-page.what-is-ecency: Decentralized, rewarding, true ownership social network
landing-page.various-digital-tokens: and earn various digital tokens, reward others and build a rewarding community.
landing-page.true-ownership-desc: Ecency is the next generation social network for Web 3.0. Blockchain technology gives you a real free speech, without any censorship or banning. Only you control your own account, content and communities.
landing-page.decentralization-desc: has many social, gaming and financial apps that you can access with a single account you own. Access your social network account and content from any other 3rd party apps in decentralized way.
landing-page.open-source-desc: Join and be part of the building team on Web 3.0. Everything that we build is blockchain-based and open source. We welcome tech talents, developers, creators and entrepreneurs.
landing-page.download-our-application-desc-2: The social network with real free speech experience on your mobile phone or desktop. Blockchain's powerful benefits now always under your fingertips.
landing-page.our-history-p-one: Ecency (previously Esteem) started out in 2016, founder @good-karma started implementing a mobile application that would revolutionize the way you interact and create, build, engage online. With time grew to something much bigger.
landing-page.our-history-p-two: Since then we have been continuing to build for Web 3.0 and improve our blockchain-based social network, making sure apps are as accessible as possible, secure and in many languages the world speaks.
landing-page.our-vision-p-one: We want to bring a secure and rewarding blockchain experience to all people. Social media without any limits and censorship, where only you control your own account and your communities. Secured by blockchain, powered by people.
landing-page.our-vision-p-two: Our main principles: Bring rewarding communities, true ownership, empowered creators, free speech into the hands of millions.
landing-page.subscribe-paragraph: Be first to know what's happening in decentralized web.
landing-page.success-message-subscribe: A verification link has been sent to your email account!
landing-page.error-occured: A server error has been occured.
